title: tangALi vashavallave
sahitya:
tangALi vashavallave


anupallavi

  angadoLage baudingaLu tumbitu


caraNam 1    candanadinda kushangaLa tavisalu indu kiraNa bandu kandisalu 
manda mArutadali nindiralArenahondida tApavu hOhadEne heNNe
    caraNam 2    bhangAravoDalige bhAravAgiyide shrngarisi koLa sEralilla 
angaja sharatApa tALalAre nAnu unguravu ninage ucitavEne heNNe
    caraNam 3    munne purandara viTTalarAya kUDi innu bArendare bAranEke 
anna pAna ruciyAgi tOralilla ninnANe kaNNIge nidre bAradu heNNe
